name: Home Renovation Expense Tracker
description: Ideal for those who are looking to keep track of their home renovation expenses.Are you looking for a tracker to keep track of home renovation payments and spend within budget?This tracker is perfect to set budget for renovation expenses, assign expense categories and spend within the allocated budget.Are you looking to automate PDF generation for repetitive documents like invoices, agreements, contracts, certificates, reports, letters etc?AutoDocCreator lets you instantly generate PDFs from Goo
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Install the extension and setup the automation.; One-time setup and configuration; Quick 5-minute installation process; Copy Notion Database properties placeholders; Paste them into your Google Document template; One-time setup per document template; Set your preferred automation schedule; Automatically scans Notion database
